item.title: The Understandable Convictions of Luigi Mangione
item.description: Upon the recent shooting in the street of UHC CEO, I’ve felt extreme conviction to vent my thoughts and feelings about it and about the alleged assailant Luigi Mangione.

item.title: My Thursday Friday & Ephiphanies
item.description: Two epiphanies come together to make me stop and realize I’m not going to be that entrepreneur-bro-sigma-male-grindset.

item.title: I Quit My Job (The Journey Begins)
item.description: I finally quit my job. So I discuss how I feel with where I’m at. That includes what I hope to start consistently doing, what I still struggle with, and my philosophies.
